subject: clutch pedal issue
description_text:
hi i purchased your pedals about a month ago. i've been having issues with
clutch mechanism. its not smooth. very jerky and i can feel the jerkiness
especially on the bite point when im trying to be smooth. What can i do to
fix this?

conversations.body_text: Hi Anthony Jilwan,  You can try removing the dual-direction hydraulic damper on the clutch. If this resolves the issue, we will send you a replacement dual-direction hydraulic damper free of charge.

what solved it was when I loosened one of the bolts connecting the spring
mechanism. The countersunk bolt wasn't flush with the surface of the
mechanism on the inside. it works now but only with a loose bolt. can i get
a replacement for this part? or clutch or something?
Hi Anthony Jilwan,  Please take a photo, and I’ll help you verify it.
